Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160; &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;8.01 - Other Events. On June&#160;16, 2021, Microsoft Corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) announced that the independent members of the Company&#8217;s board of directors unanimously elected chief executive officer Satya Nadella to the role of board chair and John W. Thompson to the role of lead independent director.
